events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit me at all. I want to return it and get a full refund.
The case was categorized under Refund based on the customer's mention of return and refund requests.
The support case was assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund request promptly.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is in its original condition with tags?
Sure, the order number is #452789 and yes, the jacket is unworn and still has the tags attached.
Thank you for the info. You can send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly. Once received, we will process your full refund.
That sounds great! I appreciate the quick help and will wait for the return label email.
The return label has been sent to your email. Please ship the jacket within 7 days to complete the refund process.
Just checking in to see if you were able to return the jacket and if your refund has been processed smoothly.
Yes, I sent the jacket back last week and already received my refund. Thanks again for the excellent service!
We are happy to hear your refund was successful. Closing the case now, and we hope to assist you again in the future.
